1143968568620584960.text: The Senate bill to provide $4.59 billion in funding to address the #HumanitarianCrisis at the southern border just passed the chamber with significant #bipartisan support. I urge our House Democrat colleagues to put politics aside and join us in providing real relief.

1143968567597117441.text: Dems, who’ve claimed for months that the crisis at our #SouthernBorder was ‘manufactured,’ are finally accepting the reality of this crisis. But while the GOP is determined to get funding through Congress, House Dems passed a partisan bill they know will never be signed into law.

1143968566137561089.text: The #HumanitarianCrisis is unlike anything we’ve seen at our border. Resources are stretched to a breaking point — making it more difficult to provide adequate care to families & unaccompanied children. The Senate just passed a bill, which I supported, to provide vital funding.
